stories.text:
Hi, guys! I just made a google sheet that helps to track your investment portfolio ( largely based on the other's work) and to plan for your FIRE( financial freedom, retire early). Please visit the google sheet and make a copy of it.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DEg4hOy-rJ632BBFZhmLKmJ1miVR2YHIgf7BQeiXp98/edit#gid=1321282994

A majority of credit goes to Rob Berger who created the investment tracking tool in the first place. Here's the link that shows his instructions:https://robberger.com/investment-tracking-spreadsheet/.

Please let me know your feedback.
